welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Les Pennes-Mirabeau, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and savor the unique beauty of our city during your stay. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Castellet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
